scripts.test: pnpm db:ensure && pnpm test:unit && pnpm test:visual:run && pnpm test:e2e:run; EXIT_CODE=$?; pnpm db:stop; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm db:ensure && pnpm test:e2e:run; EXIT_CODE=$?; pnpm db:stop; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.test:e2e:run: export BASE_URL=${BASE_URL:-http://localhost:5174}; playwright test --config e2e/playwright.config.ts --project=auth-tests --no-deps && PW_SETUP_PROJECTS=chromium,chromium-mobile playwright test --config e2e/playwright.config.ts --project=setup --project=chromium --project=chromium-mobile
scripts.test:e2e:preview-bypass: pnpm db:ensure && playwright test --config e2e/playwright.preview-bypass.config.ts; EXIT_CODE=$?; pnpm db:stop; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.test:visual: pnpm db:ensure && pnpm test:visual:run; EXIT_CODE=$?; pnpm db:stop; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.test:visual:run: docker run --rm --network host --shm-size=1gb --ipc=host -v $(pwd):/work -w /work -e CI=true -e PW_PER_TEST_CONTEXT=${PW_PER_TEST_CONTEXT:-} -e PW_SETUP_PROJECTS=visual,visual-mobile -e VITE_SUPABASE_URL=http://localhost:54321 -e VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=$(npx supabase status -o json 2>/dev/null | sed -n '/^{/,/^}/p' | jq -r '(.ANON_KEY // .PUBLISHABLE_KEY // empty)') -e SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY=$(npx supabase status -o json 2>/dev/null | sed -n '/^{/,/^}/p' | jq -r '(.SERVICE_ROLE_KEY // .SECRET_KEY // empty)') -e INBUCKET_URL=http://localhost:54324 -e BASE_URL=$(if [ "${PW_PER_TEST_CONTEXT:-}" = "1" ]; then echo http://localhost:4173; else echo http://localhost:5174; fi) -e TEST_USER_EMAIL=e2e-test@example.com mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.57.0-jammy /bin/bash -c 'mkdir -p /run/dbus && dbus-daemon --system --fork 2>/dev/null || true && corepack enable && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm exec playwright test --config e2e/playwright.config.ts --project=setup --project=visual --project=visual-mobile'; EXIT_CODE=$?; pnpm test:visual:fix-permissions; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.test:visual:update: pnpm db:ensure && docker run --rm --network host --shm-size=1gb --ipc=host -v $(pwd):/work -w /work -e CI=true -e PW_PER_TEST_CONTEXT=${PW_PER_TEST_CONTEXT:-} -e PW_SETUP_PROJECTS=visual,visual-mobile -e VITE_SUPABASE_URL=http://localhost:54321 -e VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=$(npx supabase status -o json 2>/dev/null | sed -n '/^{/,/^}/p' | jq -r '(.ANON_KEY // .PUBLISHABLE_KEY // empty)') -e SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY=$(npx supabase status -o json 2>/dev/null | sed -n '/^{/,/^}/p' | jq -r '(.SERVICE_ROLE_KEY // .SECRET_KEY // empty)') -e INBUCKET_URL=http://localhost:54324 -e BASE_URL=$(if [ "${PW_PER_TEST_CONTEXT:-}" = "1" ]; then echo http://localhost:4173; else echo http://localhost:5174; fi) -e TEST_USER_EMAIL=e2e-test@example.com mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.57.0-jammy /bin/bash -c 'mkdir -p /run/dbus && dbus-daemon --system --fork 2>/dev/null || true && corepack enable && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm exec playwright test --config e2e/playwright.config.ts --project=setup --project=visual --project=visual-mobile --update-snapshots'; EXIT_CODE=$?; pnpm test:visual:fix-permissions; pnpm db:stop; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.test:visual:local: pnpm db:ensure && BASE_URL=${BASE_URL:-http://localhost:5174} PW_SETUP_PROJECTS=visual,visual-mobile playwright test --config e2e/playwright.config.ts --project=setup --project=visual; pnpm db:stop
